review: I come from having AppleTV for the last 5 years or so. I am very satisfied with my fire stick.  It installed in TV and WiFi easily. There is plenty of stuff pre-loaded to play around with for free.  But I have to say this has pushed to get Prime and enjoy the full capabilities of my Stick.  Oh,  and a game controller too.

review: Be aware, if you do not live in the U.S. A. this fire stick won't work. So don't purchase if you don't reside in the US. Only Netflix is accessible, so it wasn't a complete wasted purchase. Marketing division/department at Amazon please inform the general public of ALL your devices which only work if you live in the US. It is mandatory that all Amazon users know this since folks such as myself cannot return any purchases.
author: lori

review: Great for the TV, games, music and movies! The gang love it. I got it for when the cable TV goes out.

review: The fire stick has been great. I just wish I could get access to HBO now. While HBO GO is great, I don't have cable and this is my go-to mechanism for shows etc. I can get HBO NOW on my computer and phone as well as tablet, but stinks that I can't get it on the big screen.

review: We got several sticks (Roku, chromecast, gbox) and of all I prefer the fire stick. After the fire stick I would get the Gbox Midnight 2. The fire stick just comes ready, plug and play. The chromecast  stopped working after I decided to change TVs. The Roku cannot play my movies and I cannot download apps.
